interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/10/12
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kunihiko Yuyama'], 'Starring': ['Ikue Ohtani', 'Veronica Taylor'], 'Studio': ['Pokemon']}
Review Text: Honestly the show quality is fine but I find the whole premise of the Pokemon thing a bit odd.  I don't think it sets a good example for behavior at all.  I know...it is popular but so are a lot of other things I think are not appropriate.
Review Title: Not the best role model...
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.text: Honestly the show quality is fine but I find the whole premise of the Pokemon thing a bit odd.  I don't think it sets a good example for behavior at all.  I know...it is popular but so are a lot of other things I think are not appropriate.
